pages.disclaimer: GamerLink Disclaimer - Important Information GamerLink Home Join the fun World of games The best choice Community and support Connect Disclaimer User Content GamerLink may allow users to submit, post, or transmit content such as reviews, comments, or other materials. By submitting any content to our website, you grant GamerLink a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, royalty-free, and non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, perform, and display such content in any form, media, or technology now known or later developed. You also represent and warrant that you own or otherwise control all of the rights to the content that you post; that the content is accurate; that use of the content you supply does not violate this policy and will not cause injury to any person or entity; and that you will indemnify GamerLink for all claims resulting from content you supply. Privacy Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which explains how we handle your personal information. By using our website, you agree to the terms of our Privacy Policy. Security While we strive to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee the security of any information you transmit to us, and you do so at your own risk. We are not responsible for the circumvention of any privacy settings or security measures contained on the website. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer. Termination GamerLink reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to terminate your access to all or part of the website, with or without notice. Entire Agreement This Disclaimer, along with our Privacy Policy and any other legal notices published by GamerLink on the website, shall constitute the entire agreement between you and GamerLink concerning the website and supersedes all prior agreements or understandings between you and GamerLink with respect to the website. Severability If any provision of this Disclaimer is deemed invalid, void, or for any reason unenforceable, that provision will be deemed severable and will not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining provision. Waiver No waiver by GamerLink of any term or condition set out in this Disclaimer shall be deemed a further or continuing waiver of such term or condition or a waiver of any other term or condition, and any failure of GamerLink to assert a right or provision under this Disclaimer shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision. Age Restriction By using our website, you affirm that you are at least 18 years of age or the age of majority in your jurisdiction, whichever is greater. If you are under 18 years of age, you may use our website only with the involvement of a parent or guardian. Health and Safety GamerLink encourages all users to take regular breaks while playing computer games. Prolonged gaming sessions can lead to health issues such as eye strain, repetitive strain injuries, and other physical ailments. Please prioritize your health and well-being while enjoying our games. Feedback and Suggestions We welcome your feedback and suggestions on how to improve our website and services. However, please note that any feedback, comments, ideas, or suggestions you provide to us will be considered non-confidential and non-proprietary. By submitting feedback, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, irrevocable, perpetual license to use and publish those ideas and materials for any purpose, without compensation to you. By using GamerLink, you signify your acceptance of this Disclaimer. If you do not agree to this Disclaimer, please do not use our website. Thank you for visiting GamerLink! We hope you enjoy exploring the exciting world of computer games with us. gamerlink@gmail.com GamerLink © 2024 GamerLink. All Rights Reserved. | Your Gateway to Endless Gaming Adventures. pages.index: GamerLink - Your Ultimate Gaming Destination GamerLink Home Join the fun World of games The best choice Community and support Connect GamerLink: Your Ultimate Gaming Destination Welcome to GamerLink, the hub for all gaming enthusiasts! Whether you're into action-packed adventures, strategic battles, or immersive role-playing, we've got you covered. Connect, play, and conquer with GamerLink! Get the game Join the Fun Why Choose GamerLink At GamerLink, we strive to create the best gaming experience for you. Here's what sets us apart: Seamless Connectivity Connect with gamers worldwide, form alliances, and take on challenges together. 500+ Games Available 1M+ Active Players Explore, Play, Enjoy Dive into a world of gaming with GamerLink. Our platform offers a variety of genres to cater to every gamer's taste. Action Games Get your adrenaline pumping with our top-rated action games that promise non-stop excitement. Strategy Games Test your tactical skills with games that require strategy, foresight, and cunning. Role-Playing Games Immerse yourself in fantastical worlds and live out epic stories with our RPG selection. Our Top Picks Eternal Warriors Embark on an epic quest to save the kingdom from ancient evils. Get the game Galactic Conquerors Lead your fleet to victory in this thrilling space strategy game. Get the game Mystic Realms Explore enchanted lands and uncover hidden secrets in this captivating RPG. Get the game Inclusive Community We welcome gamers of all levels and backgrounds to join and share their passion. Dedicated Support Our support team is always ready to help you with any issues or questions. Safe Environment Play with peace of mind knowing that we prioritize your safety and security. Community and Support Why You'll Love Our Community GamerLink is not just about playing games; it's about being part of a vibrant community. Here's what makes us special: Connect and Collaborate Form Lasting Bonds At GamerLink, we believe in the power of connection. Join us to meet like-minded gamers, form teams, and achieve greatness together. Join Clans Team up with others and participate in clan wars for exclusive rewards. Global Tournaments Compete in international tournaments and showcase your skills on a global stage. In-Game Chat Communicate seamlessly with friends and foes using our robust in-game chat system. The Last Frontier Survive in a post-apocalyptic world and uncover the mysteries that lie beyond. Get the game Dragon's Quest Embark on a legendary adventure to defeat the dragon and save the kingdom. Get the game Shadow Assassin Become a master of stealth and complete thrilling missions in this action-packed game. Get the game Mystic Forest Explore the enchanting forest, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden treasures. Get the game Stay Updated Subscribe for Updates Never miss out on the latest news, game releases, and exclusive offers. Subscribe to our newsletter and stay in the loop! I accept the Privacy Policy Send a request GamerLink © 2024 GamerLink. All Rights Reserved. | Your Gateway to Endless Gaming Adventures. pages.privacy-policy: GamerLink Privacy Policy - Your Data, Our Responsibility GamerLink Home Join the fun World of games The best choice Community and support Connect Privacy Policy Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide the Services and fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, unless otherwise required by law. We may also retain certain information for legitimate business purposes, such as to resolve disputes, enforce our agreements, and comply with legal obligations. Third-Party Links and Services Our Services may contain links to third-party websites, services, or applications that are not owned or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information. Do Not Track Some web browsers have a "Do Not Track" feature that allows users to indicate their preference not to be tracked by websites. However, we do not currently respond to Do Not Track signals. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at gamerlink@gmail.com. We will do our best to respond to your inquiry in a timely manner. By using the Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to this Privacy Policy, please do not use the Services. Thank you for choosing GamerLink. We are committed to providing you with a safe and enjoyable gaming experience while protecting your privacy and security. If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please do not hesitate to contact us at gamerlink@gmail.com. We are always happy to help. At GamerLink, we value your trust and strive to maintain the highest standards of privacy and security. We hope that this Privacy Policy has provided you with a clear understanding of how we collect, use, and disclose your information when you use our Services. By using our Services, you consent to our collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at gamerlink@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing GamerLink, and happy gaming! GamerLink © 2024 GamerLink. All Rights Reserved. | Your Gateway to Endless Gaming Adventures. pages.terms-conditions: GamerLink Terms of Use - Rules and Guidelines GamerLink Home Join the fun World of games The best choice Community and support Connect Terms of Use Copyright Policy GamerLink respects the intellectual property rights of others and expects its users to do the same. If you believe that any content on GamerLink infringes upon your copyright, please provide our Copyright Agent with a written notice that includes the following information: A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works at that site. Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit GamerLink to locate the material. Information reasonably sufficient to permit GamerLink to contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be contacted. A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which explains how we handle your personal information and protect your privacy when you use GamerLink. By using GamerLink, you agree that GamerLink can use such data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Dispute Resolution If a dispute arises between you and GamerLink, our goal is to provide you with a neutral and cost-effective means of resolving the dispute quickly. Any controversy or claim arising out of or relating to these Terms of Use or the website shall be settled by binding arbitration in accordance with the commercial arbitration rules of the American Arbitration Association. Any such controversy or claim shall be arbitrated on an individual basis, and shall not be consolidated in any arbitration with any claim or controversy of any other party. Entire Agreement These Terms of Use, together with any amendments and any additional agreements you may enter into with GamerLink in connection with the website, shall constitute the entire agreement between you and GamerLink concerning the website. If any provision of these Terms of Use is deemed invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, the invalidity of such provision shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions of these Terms of Use, which shall remain in full force and effect. No Waiver No waiver of any term of these Terms of Use shall be deemed a further or continuing waiver of such term or any other term, and GamerLink's failure to assert any right or provision under these Terms of Use shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision. Feedback and Suggestions If you provide feedback or suggestions about GamerLink, we may use your feedback or suggestions without obligation to you. Force Majeure GamerLink shall not be liable for any failure to perform its obligations hereunder where such failure results from any cause beyond GamerLink's reasonable control, including, without limitation, mechanical, electronic or communications failure or degradation. Assignment These Terms of Use are personal to you, and are not assignable, transferable or sublicensable by you except with GamerLink's prior written consent. GamerLink may assign, transfer or delegate any of its rights and obligations hereunder without consent. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms of Use or the GamerLink website, please contact us at gamerlink@gmail.com. GamerLink © 2024 GamerLink. All Rights Reserved. | Your Gateway to Endless Gaming Adventures.
